articles.title: Leaked documents reveal heightened US anxiety over Russian and Chinese influence in Africa and Latin America - CNN
articles.description: A trove of leaked classified Pentagon documents highlight US anxieties over growing Chinese and Russian influence in Latin America and Africa. Among the details are references to Russian mercenary group Wagner exploring a contract to fight criminal gangs in H…

articles.title: Americans get some relief from rising food and gas prices - PBS NewsHour
articles.description: Inflation cooled last month to its lowest level in nearly two years. The price of groceries dropped three-tenths of a percent in March, marking the first decline in that index since September 2020. But core inflation, which does not include food and gas price…
